item.description:
Hi Folks,

Hope you are all making the most of this great, yet fleeting summer! I thought I would repeat last month's patio meetup, but this time on the Cambridge side.  Take a break from the work week, and come on out and enjoy a drink/food under the stars with your fellow countrymen. Who says we aren't able to get together with out hockey!  

 

If it looks like rain, I'll send around an alternate indoor location on the meetup day. Location TBD.

Cheers,

 

Bruce
item.how_to_find_us: Will be carrying a small Canadian flag

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Patio Drinks!
